csw.services.logging.appenders

Class FileAppender

  • java.lang.Object
    • csw.services.logging.appenders.FileAppender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogAppender

    public class FileAppender
extends java.lang.Object
implements LogAppender
    An appender that writes log messages to files.

    param: factory ActorRefFactory param: stdHeaders the headers that are fixes for this service.
